00031 class XVSize {
00032 
00033 protected:
00034 
00035   int width;
00036   int height;
00037 
00038 public:
00039 
00040   XVSize(const int cw, const int rh) { width = cw; height = rh;}
00041   XVSize() { width = 0; height = 0; }
00042 
00043   virtual ~XVSize() {}
00044 
00048   XVSize(const XVSize & xsize) {
00049     width = xsize.width;
00050     height = xsize.height;
00051   }
00052 
00053   int Width() const {return width;}
00054   int Height() const {return height;}
00055   int Rows() const {return height;}
00056   int Columns() const {return width;}
00057 
00059   inline virtual void resize(const XVSize & xsize) {
00060     height = xsize.height;
00061     width = xsize.width;
00062   }
00063 
00065   inline virtual void resize(int set_width, int set_height) {
00066     height = set_height;
00067     width = set_width;
00068   }
00069 
00071   inline XVSize & operator = (const XVSize &xs) {
00072     height = xs.height;
00073     width = xs.width;
00074     return *this;
00075   }
00076 
00077   inline XVSize & operator += (const XVSize & s) {
00078     this->width += s.width;  this->height += s.height; return *this;
00079   };
00080 
00081   inline XVSize & operator -= (const XVSize & s) {
00082     this->width -= s.width;  this->height -= s.height; return *this;
00083   };
00084 
00085   inline XVSize & operator *= (int val) {
00086     this->width *= val; this->height *= val; return *this;
00087   };
00088 };

00095 #define MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVSIZE(OP) \
00096 inline bool operator OP (const XVSize & s1, const XVSize & s2) { \
00097   return (s1.Width() OP s2.Width()) && (s1.Height() OP s2.Height()); \
00098 }; 
00099

00101 MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVSIZE(<=);
00102 MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVSIZE(>=);
00103 MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVSIZE(<);
00104 MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVSIZE(>);

00110 #define MAKE_XVSIZE_OP_XVSIZE(OP) \
00111 inline XVSize operator OP (const XVSize & s1, const XVSize & s2) { \
00112   return XVSize(s1.Width() OP s2.Width(), s1.Height() OP s2.Height()); \
00113 };

00115 MAKE_XVSIZE_OP_XVSIZE(+);
00116 MAKE_XVSIZE_OP_XVSIZE(-);

00122 #define MAKE_XVSIZE_OP_INT(OP) \
00123 inline XVSize operator OP (const XVSize & s1, const XVSize & s2) { \
00124   return XVSize(s1.Width() OP s2.Width(), s1.Height() OP s2.Height()); \
00125 };

00143 template <class T>
00144 class XVPixmap : public XVSize, public XVList {
00145 
00146   // all representations of XVImage need to be friends of Pixmap
00147   // to access and modify buffer specifications
00148 
00149   friend class XVImageBase<T>;
00150   
00151 protected:
00152   
00158   int          locked;
00159   
00163   XVImageBase<T> * master_image;
00164   
00168   T * buffer_addr;
00169   
00174   int own_flag;
00181   inline int lockPixmap(XVImageBase<T> * who){
00182     if(locked && who != master_image) return 0;
00183 /*      if(this->contains(who)){ */
00184       master_image = who;
00185       return ++locked;
00186 /*      }  */
00187 /*      return 0; */
00188   }; 
00189 
00196   inline bool unlockPixmap(XVImageBase<T> * who) {
00197     if(!locked || who != master_image) return false;
00198     --locked;
00199     if(!locked) master_image = NULL;
00200     return true;
00201   };
00202 
00203   inline int getNumLocks(XVImageBase<T> * who) { 
00204     return who == master_image ? locked : 0;
00205   };
00206   
00207 public:  
00208 
00213   XVImage_Type image_type;
00214   
00219   XVPixmap(int width = 640,int height = 480, T * s_buffer = NULL,
00220             bool own_flag=true);
00221   
00225   XVPixmap(const XVSize & xsize, T * s_buffer = NULL, 
00226             bool own_flag=true);
00227 
00228   int SizeX() const { return this->Width(); }
00229   int SizeY() const { return this->Height(); }
00230 
00231   ~XVPixmap();
00232 };

00241 class XVImageGeneric: public XVSize, public XVPosition {
00242 
00243 public:
00244   
00245   XVImageGeneric(const XVSize &xsize, const XVPosition &xvp)
00246     : XVSize(xsize), XVPosition(xvp) {}
00247   
00248   XVImageGeneric (const XVSize &xsize)
00249     : XVSize(xsize), XVPosition(0,0) {}
00250   
00251   XVImageGeneric(const int cw, const int rh, const int px = 0, const int py = 0)
00252     : XVSize(cw,rh), XVPosition(px,py) {}
00253   
00254   XVImageGeneric() : XVSize(), XVPosition() {}
00255   
00256   XVImageGeneric(const XVImageGeneric &xvg)
00257     : XVSize(xvg.width,xvg.height), XVPosition(xvg.posx, xvg.posy) {}
00258   
00264   inline bool within(const XVImageGeneric & outer) const {
00265     return (outer.PosX() < this->PosX()) && (outer.PosY() < this->PosY()) &&
00266       (outer.Width() + outer.PosX() > this->PosX() + this->Width()) &&
00267       (outer.Height() + outer.PosY() > this->PosY() + this->Height());
00268   };
00269 
00276   inline bool contains(const XVPosition & pos) const {
00277     return (pos.PosX() >= this->PosX() && pos.PosY() >= this->PosY() &&
00278          pos.PosX() < this->PosX() + this->Width() &&
00279          pos.PosY() < this->PosY() + this->Height());
00280   };      
00281 };
00282 
00283 #define MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(OP) \
00284 inline bool operator OP (const XVImageGeneric & xv1, const XVImageGeneric& xv2) { \
00285   return ((XVSize)xv1) OP ((XVSize)xv2) && ((XVPosition)xv1) OP ((XVPosition)xv2); \
00286 }; 
00287 
00288 MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(==);
00289 MAKE_COMPARE_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(!=);
00290 
00291 #define MAKE_WITHIN_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(OP, INVOP) \
00292 inline bool operator OP (const XVImageGeneric & g1, const XVImageGeneric & g2) { \
00293   return (g1.PosX() INVOP g2.PosX()) && (g1.PosY() INVOP g2.PosY()) && \
00294       ((g1.Width() + g1.PosX()) OP (g2.PosX() + g2.Width()) && \
00295          ((g1.Height() + g1.PosY()) OP g2.PosY() + g2.Height())); \
00296 };
00297 
00298 MAKE_WITHIN_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(>=, <=);
00299 MAKE_WITHIN_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(<=, >=);
00300 MAKE_WITHIN_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(<, >);
00301 MAKE_WITHIN_OP_XVIMAGEGEN(>, <);

00334 template <class T>
00335 class XVImageBase : public XVNode, public XVImageGeneric {  
00336 
00337  public:
00338   
00339   typedef T PIXELTYPE;
00340   
00341   friend class XVImageIterator<T>;
00342   
00343  protected:
00344   
00348   T * win_addr;
00349   
00353   XVPixmap<T> * pixmap;
00354   
00359   int lineskip;
00360   
00365   int write_perm;
00366   
00367 public:
00368   
00372   inline int SizeX(void) const {return pixmap->width;};
00373   
00377   inline int SizeY(void) const {return pixmap->height;};
00378  
00383   const T * data() const { return win_addr; };
00384   
00389   const T * pixData() const { return pixmap->buffer_addr; };
00390 
00395   int Skip() const { return lineskip; }
00396 
00402   virtual XVImage_Type ImageType() const {return pixmap->image_type;};
00403   
00411   T * lock(void) {
00412     write_perm = pixmap->lockPixmap(this);
00413     return write_perm ? win_addr : NULL; 
00414   };
00415   
00419   bool unlock (void) {    
00420     bool ret = pixmap->unlockPixmap(this);
00421     write_perm = pixmap->getNumLocks(this);
00422     return ret;
00423   };
00424   
00430   void reposition(const XVPosition & xvp) {
00431     posx = xvp.PosX();
00432     posy = xvp.PosY();
00433     win_addr = pixmap->buffer_addr + posy * pixmap->SizeX() + posx;
00434   }
00435   
00436   void reposition(const int px, const int py) {
00437     posx = px;
00438     posy = py;
00439     win_addr = pixmap->buffer_addr + posy * pixmap->SizeX() + posx;
00440   }
00441   
00446   void remap(T * addr,bool own_flag=true);
00447   
00451   const T * operator [] (int r) const { return win_addr + r * pixmap->SizeX(); };
00452   
00457   void virtual resize(const int set_width, const int set_height);
00458   
00463   void virtual resize(const XVSize & xsize);
00464   
00469   void virtual setSubImage(const XVSize &, const XVPosition &);
00470   void virtual setSubImage(int, int, int, int);
00471   void virtual setSubImage(const XVImageGeneric &);
00472 
00473 
00477   inline virtual void setToPixmap(){ 
00478     setSubImage(0, 0, pixmap->SizeX(), pixmap->SizeY()); 
00479   }
